pages.text: Incredible! Burning the$(item)spore bundle$()has made the atmosphere feel drier, but$(thing)much more powerful$()! These spores$(o)must$()have some form of magic within them. It is the only explanation. I can already feel their$(thing)influence$()spread throughout the world.
It is yet weak; it seems to$(thing)dissipate$()over time. Perhaps there is some way to preserve some of it in the area it was produced in?
The$(thing)spores$()seem to attach to the$(item)ashes$()from burning brush quite well. Perhaps they can use this to$(thing)keep influence over this region$().
